Rails Forum Relaunched

August 15, 2013 |
0 minute read

It's great to see again a forum that was huge coming back. This days we have stack overflow which is great, but it has a limitation that forums are built for: discuss. Discuss is a key for keeping moving forward.

I really enjoy this return. I hope it can turns again into a place for great discussions and friendship.
